title: Police free bored security guard who handcuffed himself, then realized he'd left the keys at home
text:
It's not time first time the guard handcuffed himself without holding the key

A bored security guard, who used handcuffs on himself, needed cops to free him

It was a slow overnight shift for one security guard near Milwaukee, Wisconsin. The guard was so bored that he decided to play with his handcuffs. However, he got locked in them and left the keys at home.

It happened just after 2 am Friday at a Bath and Body Works in Waukesha.

A overnight security guard found an odd activity while patrolling the Bath & Body Works in Waukesha.

Once police freed the hapless guard, he vowed to place the cuffs in his bag so not to have another fiasco.

However, this was not the first time the guard handcuffed himself, while the keys sat at home and not in his pocket.
description: A Wisconsin security guard uses his own handcuffs to pass time during overnight. The guard got locked in the cuffs with key at home, causing him to call the cops.
